name: TÉFRA
description:
Created for GBJAM 8
  • Design and programming by Ravi
  • Level Design by Monica
  • Art and sound design by Vijay
  • Music by Dust Breaks

Guide the legendary Phoenix through the fallen city of Argos.

Keyboard Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • L. Control - Attack
Gamepad Controls
  • L. Joystick - Move
  • A Button - Attack

Special thanks to Cathy and Harpreet for play testing and feedback!
